tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_ip VARCHAR(255),
  destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  traffic_volume INT
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_ip VARCHAR(255),
  destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
  bytes_transferred INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_analysis (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_ip VARCHAR(255),
  destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
  protocol VARCHAR(50),
  speed_in_mbps FLOAT,
  analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    inbound_traffic INT,
    outbound_traffic INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_device_id FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_capacity_planning (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    plan_date DATE,
    planned_capacity INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_dev_id FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic (
    traffic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    traffic_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    traffic_date DATE NOT NULL,
    traffic_volume DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    log_details TEXT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES network_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  source_ip INET,
  destination_ip INET,
  protocol INT,
  port INT,
  bytes_sent BIGINT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
  device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(255),
  device_type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  status BOOLEAN,
  last_seen TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  event_description TEXT,
  source_ip INET,
  destination_ip INET,
  bytes_transferred BIGINT
);

CREATE TABLE network_capacity_history (
  history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  total_capacity INT,
  used_capacity INT,
  available_capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE network_performance_metrics (
  metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  measurement_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  metric_name VARCHAR(50),
  metric_value FLOAT,
  unit VARCHAR(20)
);
